players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out today."
Diana: "Alice, that's a very bold claim to make so early. If you're really the detective, can you explain why you chose to investigate Bob specifically on the first night?"
Bob: "Alice is lying. I'm the real detective and I investigated Diana last night—she's innocent. Alice must be mafia trying to frame me."

Diana: "This is clearly a detective vs mafioso standoff. Bob, if you're the real detective, why would you waste your first investigation on me instead of someone more suspicious? Alice's claim seems more strategic."
You: "I investigated Bob and he is mafia. Bob claiming detective now is classic mafia deception. Diana, trust me - we must vote Bob out."

Bob: "Alice is desperate to mislead you. If I were mafia, why would I claim detective after her accusation? That would be suicide. I'm the real detective—investigate me tonight if you doubt, but vote Alice now before she kills again."
